summary: Monty Wildhorn, an alcoholic novelist of Westerns, has lost his drive. His nephew pushes him to summer in quiet Belle Isle. He begrudgingly befriends a newly single mom and her 3 girls who help him find the inspiration to write again.
cast: Morgan Freeman|Kenan Thompson|Virginia Madsen|Emma Fuhrmann|Madeline Carroll|Nicolette Pierini|C.J. Wilson|Ash Christian|Debargo Sanyal|Fred Willard|Jessica Hecht|Christopher McCann|Lucas Caleb Rooney|Kevin Pollak|Boyd Holbrook|Kevin|Tilly|Rosemary Howard
title: El verano de sus vidas
